<Naval Air Station Ellyson Field
auxiliary facility to Chevalier Field at Naval Air Station Pensacola, Florida
1:
--------------------
<Text: Naval Air Station Ellyson Field:  Originally designated Base Field 01913 (Site 3), located on the west side of Escambia Bay 16 miles northeast of NAS Pensacola, construction on an expanded facility, officially named Ellyson Field in honor of CDR Theodore G. “Spuds” Ellyson, the Navy’s first aviator, began on 26 February 1941.>

<Naval Air Station Ellyson Field
